doc:
Ralph Peduto https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ralph_Peduto 0 Ralph Peduto (March 9, 1942 – May 12, 2014) was an American actor, playwright, writer and director. Peduto's film roles included Mrs. Doubtfire in 1993, The Rock in 1996, and Patch Adams in 1998, while his television credits included guest spots in Cheers and Hill Street Blues. He ultimately appeared in more than 100 film and television roles, as forty television commercials. An acting teacher as well as an actor, Peduto founded Acting On Camera, an acting school in Santa Cruz, California. Ralph_Peduto ( March_9_,_1942 – May_12_,_2014 ) was an_American_actor , playwright , writer_and_director . Peduto 's_film_roles included Mrs._Doubtfire in 1993 , The_Rock in 1996 , and Patch_Adams in 1998 , while his_television_credits included guest_spots in Cheers and Hill_Street_Blues . He ultimately appeared in more_than_100_film_and_television_roles , as forty_television_commercials . An_acting_teacher as_well_as an_actor , Peduto founded Acting On Camera , an_acting_school in Santa_Cruz , California .
